name: Aisi Hay Tanhai
description: Pakeeza, a young woman, is madly in love with her boyfriend, Hamza. She faces a lot of troubles in her life following a social media incident.
cast: Fazila Qazi as Dr. Saad's sister

name: Baby Baji
description: After her husband's illness, Baby baji struggles to hold the family together.

name: Hum Tum
description: The series revolves around two houses in one neighborhood where one house has intelligent girls while the other possesses good mannered boys.
cast: Ahad Raza Mir as 'Adi' Adam Sultan
Ramsha Khan as Neha Qutub ud Din
Sarah Khan as Maha Qutub ud Din Sultan

name: Ehd e Wafa
description: Four college friends Saad, Shahzain, Shariq and Shehryar, go through various trials and tribulations as misunderstandings between them grow.
cast: Ahad Raza Mir as Captain Saad Faraz
Osman Khalid Butt as Malik Shahzain
Ahmed Ali Akbar as Shahryar Sherry Afzal
Alizeh Shah as Captain Dr. Dua Saad
Zara Noor Abbas as Rani Shahzain

name: Yaqeen Ka Safar
description: A young woman is shattered by the death of her mother caused by her father; an upright lawyer fights for justice when a poor girl is sexually assaulted by a political heir and his friends.
cast: Ahad Raza Mir as Dr. Asfandyar Ali Khan
Sajal Aly as Dr. Zubiya Khalil
Hira Mani as Gaeti Daniyal Ali Khan
Shaz Khan as Barrister Daniyal Ali Khan
Farhan Ali Agha as Barrister Usman Ali Khan
